translations: n.缝合线（seam 的复数）；缝合处
v.焊接（seam 的三单形式）；用线缝接

phrs.translation: 侧缝；侧骨；摆缝；水平焊缝
纵接缝；纵向焊缝；纵向缝
用…而留下伤疤；因…而长了皱纹

sentences.sentence: The seams had been made watertight by pads of moss, fixed by wedges and yew stitches.
sentences.translation: 接缝处用苔藓垫子做了防水处理，用楔子和紫杉针固定。

sentences.sentence: My whole life had come apart at the seams.
sentences.translation: 我的整个生活都崩溃了。

sentences.sentence: Our university system is in danger of falling apart at the seams.
sentences.translation: 我们的大学体系处在崩溃的危险之中。
